Header: National Day of the Kingdom of Thailand commemorated in Sri Lanka
Content: The Royal Thai Embassy in Colombo organized a reception marking the National Day of the Kingdom of Thailand, the birthday anniversary of His Majesty the late King Bhumibol Adulyadej and Thailand’s Father’s Day on the 5th of December at Shangri La Hotel in Colombo. Around 300 including government officials,diplomatic corps private sector and the Thai Community in Sri Lankaparticipated in the event. Chief Guest on the occasion was Foreign Ministry Secretary Ravinatha Ariyasinghe. Her Excellency Mrs. Chulamanee Chartsuwan, Ambassador Thailand delivered the inaugural speech. Special events that marked the occasion were the presentation of certificates to five Sri Lankan students who were selected to participate in the study visit in Thailand and the lucky draws for the awarding of numerous prizes . Foreign Ministry Secretary Ravinatha Ariyasinghe also expressed his views.
